This version on Research Unbound is broken down into sections to make it easy to comment and ask questions about each part of the report.  The idea is to stimulate discussion and action.  So please do comment! item.content:encoded:
The research report was published in early 2014.

This version on Research Unbound is broken down into sections to make it easy to comment and ask questions about each part of the report.  The idea is to stimulate discussion and action.  So please do comment!

The report is also available to download in PDF:

  • Exploring family carer involvement in forensic mental health services -Full report (PDF)
  • Executive Summary (PDF)
  • Plain English version (PDF)
